scripts.build: pnpm -r run clean && pnpm run build:tokens && pnpm run check:tailwind-preset && turbo run build
scripts.build:trace: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--trace-uncaught --enable-source-maps" pnpm --filter cms exec next build --debug
scripts.test:coverage: sh -c 'CI=true pnpm -r --no-bail --workspace-concurrency=1 --filter=!@acme/next-config run test -- --coverage; status=$?; pnpm --filter @acme/next-config run test:coverage || true; pnpm run coverage:merge; exit $status'
scripts.coverage:merge: mkdir -p coverage/merged && nyc merge coverage .nyc_output coverage/merged/coverage.json && nyc report -t coverage/merged -r html -r text-summary
scripts.e2e: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start -- --port 3006'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress run"
scripts.e2e:open: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start -- --port 3006'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress open"
scripts.e2e:smoke: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start -- --port 3006'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress run --env grepTags=smoke"
scripts.e2e:a11y: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start -- --port 3006'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress run --env grepTags=a11y"
scripts.e2e:lh: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start -- --port 3006'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress run --env grepTags=lh --browser chrome --config viewportWidth=1280,viewportHeight=720"
scripts.e2e:coverage: COVERAGE=1 TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && start-server-and-test "sh -c 'COVERAGE=1 pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && COVERAGE=1 pnpm --filter @apps/cms start -- --port 3006'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress run"
scripts.e2e:dashboard: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/cms build && pnpm --filter @apps/cms start -- --port 3006'" http://localhost:3006 "pnpm exec cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/dashboard-signin.cy.ts,cypress/e2e/cms-settings-a11y.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-*.cy.ts'"
scripts.e2e:cms:core: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-core.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:shop: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-shop.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:settings: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-shop-settings.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:data: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-data.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:previews: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-previews.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:admin: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 start-server-and-test "pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE pnpm exec cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/cms-a11y-admin.cy.ts"
scripts.e2e:cms:dnd: NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 sh -c 'ROOT=$(node scripts/src/mktemp-data-root.ts) && start-server-and-test "DATA_ROOT=$ROOT/shops pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "TEST_DATA_ROOT=$ROOT/shops pnpm exec cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/cms-page-builder-dnd.cy.ts,cypress/e2e/cms-page-builder.cy.ts"'
scripts.e2e:cms:functional: NEXTAUTH_URL=http://localhost:3010 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3010 sh -c 'ROOT=$(node scripts/src/mktemp-data-root.ts) && start-server-and-test "DATA_ROOT=$ROOT/shops pnpm --filter @apps/cms exec next dev -p 3010" http://localhost:3010 "TEST_DATA_ROOT=$ROOT/shops pnpm exec cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/cms-*-functional.cy.ts"'
scripts.e2e:shop: TEST_DATA_ROOT=__tests__/data node scripts/src/seed-test-data.ts && start-server-and-test "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @apps/shop-bcd build && pnpm --filter @apps/shop-bcd start -- --port 3004'" http://localhost:3004 "CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3004 pnpm exec cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/shop-*.cy.ts,cypress/e2e/session-expiration.cy.ts"
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm run e2e:dashboard && pnpm run e2e:shop
scripts.test-storybook:all: cross-env WAIT_ON_TIMEOUT=120000 start-server-and-test "storybook dev -p 6007 --ci" http://localhost:6007 "pnpm exec test-storybook --url http://localhost:6007"
scripts.test-storybook:runner: cross-env WAIT_ON_TIMEOUT=120000 start-server-and-test "pnpm run storybook:ci" http://localhost:6007 "pnpm exec test-storybook --config-dir .storybook-ci --url http://localhost:6007 --includeTags ci --testTimeout 30000 --maxWorkers 2"
scripts.storybook:smoke: cross-env WAIT_ON_TIMEOUT=120000 start-server-and-test "pnpm run storybook:ci" http://localhost:6007 "pnpm exec playwright test .storybook/test-runner/__tests__/{smoke-health,tokens,usefsm}.test.ts --reporter=list"
scripts.provision-cms: pnpm run create-shop && pnpm run build:tokens
scripts.tailwind:check: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--experimental-vm-modules" pnpm exec jest test/unit/tailwind-build.spec.ts test/unit/postcss-config.spec.ts test/unit/tailwind-postcss.spec.ts
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rimraf dist build lib *.tsbuildinfo
